comment.author: 13423385@N03
comment._content: The map shows a location in Congo, but this is Mount Ndirande in Malawi...

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: "Mandala" is not a town but the local name given to the African Lakes Company, later Corporation, and its buildings because of the glasses (mandala) worn by John, one of the Moir brothers who were the first managers of the company in Nyasaland.
